dooyit.ui

Class UICommandBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • dooyit.ui.UICommandBox

  • public class UICommandBox
extends java.lang.Object
    The UICommandBox class contains the methods to modify the textfield in which the user types his commands, as well as to retrieve the user's command input history.
    Since:
    2016-04-10
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    Wu Wenqi

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void empty()
      This method is used to clear any text that is displayed in the user input textfield.
      protected javafx.scene.control.TextField getCommandTextField()
      This method is used to retrieve the user input textfield.
      protected javafx.scene.layout.HBox getView()
      This method is used to retrieve the view box which contains the user input textfield.
      private void initCommandBox()
      This method is used to initialize the view box that contains the user input textfield.
      private void initCommandHistory()
      This method is used to initialize the ArrayList that will store the user's input history.
      private void initCommandTextField()
      This method is used to initialize the textfield in which the user types his commands.
      private void initialize()
      This method is used to initialize the UICommandBox It is used by the constructor.
      protected boolean isSelected()
      This method is used to check if the user input textfield is focused.
      private boolean isValidNextHistoryIndex()
      This method is used to check if the index points to a later user input in history.
      private boolean isValidPrevHistoryIndex()
      This method is used to check if the index points to an earlier user input in history.
      protected void select()
      This method is used to focus the user input textfield.
      protected void showNextHistory()
      This method is used to populate the textfield with a later user input from history.
      protected void showPrevHistory()
      This method is used to populate the textfield with an earlier user input from history.
      protected void updateHistory(java.lang.String s)
      This method is used to add an user input string to the history and update the index.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        This method is used to initialize the UICommandBox It is used by the constructor.

      • initCommandTextField

        private void initCommandTextField()
        This method is used to initialize the textfield in which the user types his commands. It is used by the initialize method.

      • initCommandBox

        private void initCommandBox()
        This method is used to initialize the view box that contains the user input textfield. It is used by the initialize method.

      • initCommandHistory

        private void initCommandHistory()
        This method is used to initialize the ArrayList that will store the user's input history. It is used by the initialize method.

      • isValidPrevHistoryIndex

        private boolean isValidPrevHistoryIndex()
        This method is used to check if the index points to an earlier user input in history. It is called by the showPrevHistory method.
        Returns:
        True if the index is valid, False otherwise.

      • isValidNextHistoryIndex

        private boolean isValidNextHistoryIndex()
        This method is used to check if the index points to a later user input in history. It is called by the showNextHistory method.
        Returns:
        True if the index is valid, False otherwise.

      • updateHistory

        protected void updateHistory(java.lang.String s)
        This method is used to add an user input string to the history and update the index.
        Parameters:
        s - The user input to be added to history.

      • showPrevHistory

        protected void showPrevHistory()
        This method is used to populate the textfield with an earlier user input from history.

      • showNextHistory

        protected void showNextHistory()
        This method is used to populate the textfield with a later user input from history.

      • getView

        protected javafx.scene.layout.HBox getView()
        This method is used to retrieve the view box which contains the user input textfield.
        Returns:
        The view box which contains the user input textfield.

      • getCommandTextField

        protected javafx.scene.control.TextField getCommandTextField()
        This method is used to retrieve the user input textfield.
        Returns:
        The user input textfield.

      • isSelected

        protected boolean isSelected()
        This method is used to check if the user input textfield is focused.
        Returns:
        True if the user textfield is focused, False otherwise.

      • select

        protected void select()
        This method is used to focus the user input textfield.

      • empty

        protected void empty()
        This method is used to clear any text that is displayed in the user input textfield.
